config.token: GitHub.com or GitHub Enterprise personal access token. Create at https://github.com/settings/tokens. Must have 'repo' scope to access private repositories.
config.url: The URL of a GitHub instance to connect to. Default is "https://github.com"
config.cloneProtocol: Protocol to use to clone a repository. Defaults to 'https'. Valid values are either 'https' or 'ssh'.
